channel.title: Blog on Imperial Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Imperial Blog

item.title: Blog Update II
item.description: Again it’s been quiet a while since updating the blog. Because of this and to prevent people think the game is abandoned, I added three new things to the website. Let’s see them!

item.title: Blog Update I
item.description: So it’s been more than a month since my last update and in the good blogging fashion I need to get you up to date of what I’ve been doing. Some stuff to let you know this project is still kicking and put you in the context of my life.
